document.full_text: uganda's main opposition leader, arrested and charged with inciting protests that have left at least five dead, was released on bail on wednesday and immediately vowed to carry on the campaign.
document.title: uganda's besigye bailed, vows to continue protests
lines_and_colors: uganda's main opposition leader, arrested and charged with inciting protests that have left at least five dead, was released on bail on wednesday and immediately vowed to carry on the campaign.
